root.name: Gary Grigsby's War in Russia
root.description: A turn based strategy game that covers the Russo-German war of 1941-1945. The game has 3 campaign starting points: 1941 (the beginning of Operation Barbarossa), 1942 (the renewed German effort to push into the old fields of the Russian Caucus) and 1943 (the last series of major offensives launched by Germany in the east). The end date for all scenarios is July 1945.Each hex represents 20 miles while every turn represents one week. Although it was originally released in 1993, various teams of dedicated programmers have updated the game numerous times with the last update being in 2000.
